context.application: Broad immunophenotyping of leukocytes including myeloid and lymphoid cell lineages
context.additional_notes: 27-color flow cytometry panel for immunophenotyping of major leukocyte populations in fixed whole blood.

children.name: ILCs
children.marker_logic: CD3- CD4- CD19- CD16- CD56- CD127+

validation.curator_notes: Manually verified 2026-01-13. Panel markers and gating hierarchy confirmed against original OMIP paper.
